bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: ① Etiological Agent. identical with ji leng 積冷 , accumulated cold. Sheng ji zong lu 聖濟總錄 57: 有冷積不 散，乍間乍甚，為久久腹痛者 , “If there is cold accumulation which fails todisperse, which sometimes intermits and then is extreme again, and causes abdominal pain over a long time”.

② Pathological Condition identical with ji leng 積冷 , accumulated cold. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 28: 關上脈襜襜 大，而尺寸細者，其人必心腹冷積 , “If a person’s movement in the vessels is expanded and massive in his gate section, while it is fine in his foot-long section, he must have a cold accumulation in his center and abdomen”.
